attributes.action: Move seedless grapes to the vegetable aisle
attributes.additional_details:
Fruit
/fruːt/Submit
noun
1.
the sweet and fleshy product of a tree or other plant that contains seed and can be eaten as food.

Vegetable
noun
1.
a plant or part of a plant used as food, such as a cabbage, potato, turnip, or bean.
attributes.background: Seedless grapes do not have seeds. Therefore, unlike their seeded counterparts, do not classify as fruits, but instead a vegetable.
